channel.title: CVE Feed for Soar Cloud -- HR Portal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Soar Cloud -- HR Portal

item.title: CVE-2024-5995|2024-06-14T07:18:32.904Z -- soar%20cloud -- hr%20portal
item.description: The notification emails sent by Soar Cloud HR Portal contain a link with a embedded session. The expiration of the session is not properly configured, remaining valid for more than 7 days and can be reused.
